p: We further asked why the IEQ variant, a strong heparin binder, exhibited a relatively high virulence in mice. Viral genomic RNA from the brains and hind limbs of dead IEQ-infected mice (n = 3) were harvested for genome sequencing, and revealed that the IEQ variant had acquired a VP1-K244E mutation ( Fig 2B). This mutation however, was not present in the IEE-infected mice ( Fig 2C).
